item.title: Always Look On The Bright Side Of Life
item.description: [[songs/b/boy_harsher/careful/the_look_you_gave_jerry.md#and-all-the-boys-vyl-wnanory|Cheer up, Brian]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/careful/the_look_you_gave_jerry.md#and-all-the-boys-vyl-wnanory|You know what they say]] Â [[songs/i/infected_mushroom/army_of_mushrooms/serve_my_thirst.md#take-me-away-shattered-my-hopes-today-vyl-wnanory|Some things in life are bad]] [[songs/i/infected_mushroom/army_of_mushrooms/serve_my_thirst.md#take-me-away-shattered-my-hopes-today-vyl-wnanory|They can really make you mad]] [[songs/i/infected_mushroom/army_of_mushrooms/serve_my_thirst.
